Package adrenaline.model.deck

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AtomicWeaponEffect
    Interface of a weapon effect, implemented by other classes
    WeaponEffectRequirement
    WeaponEffectRequirement is implemented by subclasses
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicEffectsFactory
    Class that implements every effect of the weapons in the game
    BaseEffect
    Extension of WeaponEffect class, this class is for the base effect of a weapon
    Card
    Card is the supertype for Weapon, Tile and PowerUp.
    ChainEffect
    Extension of ChainEffect class, this class if for the chain effect
    Deck
    Deck is the supertype for WeaponsDeck, TilesDeck and PowerUpsDeck.
    DeckCreator
    Abstract class for the deck creation, implemented by subclass
    DirectionRequirement
    DirectionRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement class
    DistanceRequirement
    DistanceRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    LimitedDirectionRequirement
    Extension of DirectionRequirement
    MoveToVisibleRequirement
    MoveToVisibleRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    NullRequirement
    NullRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement
    OptionalEffect
    Extension of WeaponEffect, it creates the optional effects of a weapon
    PowerUpsDeck
    PowerUpsDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of PowerUp cards
    PowerUpsDeckCreator
    PowerUpsDeckCreator is the subclass of DeckCreator and contains the deck of powerups
    RoomRequirement
    RoomRequirement is the implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement, it contains all the requirements for a room effect
    TargetType
    Class that specifies all the different type of targets
    Tile
    Tile is a Card which contains Ammos and (optionally) a PowerUp collectible on the game board when a player is located on a square which contains one
    TilesDeck
    TilesDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of Tile cards
    TilesDeckCreator
    TilesDeckCreator is a subclass of DeckCreator TilesDeckCreator creates a deck of the tiles on the map which contain ammo and (eventually) a powerup
    VisibilityRequirement
    VisibilityRequirement is a implementation of WeaponEffectRequirement It creates visibility requirements for a weapon
    Weapon
    Weapon is a Card which contains the description about a single weapon available in the game and its effects
    WeaponEffect
    Abstract class for the effects of a weapon, implemented by subclasses
    WeaponEffectTypeAdapter
    WeaponEffectTypeAdapter is the class that read all the data of the weapons from the json files, extends TypeAdapter class
    WeaponsDeck
    WeaponsDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of Weapon cards
    WeaponsDeckCreator
    WeaponsDeckCreator is a subclass of DeckCreator, it creates the weapons' deck
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Ammo
    Ammo is the enumeration class which defines the three different kinds of ammo.
    TileFormat
    TileFormat enumerates all the format of tile available in the game
    WeaponType
    WeaponType is the enumeration class which lists all the weapon types in the game.
